item.title: About Me
item.description: My name is David Thimotti and I live in Belo Horizonte, Brazil. Currently, I’m working as an analyst at Alika Solutions. I have a technologist’s degree in computer networks and a telecommunications and computer networks specialization at the Centro Universitário Estácio de Belo Horizonte. I’m interested in software engineering in general: Data structures, algorithms, protocols, architecture, design patterns and much more. Also, I work with corporate computer networks. Just recently, I started to engage more in the open source community.
